name: Open Sky Data Systems
goal:
Become more involved in the consultation process at EU level in domains that we are interested in, i.e. R&D and I, SMEs, EU finance opportunities.
Having rapid access at the information that can shape the future policies in our areas of interest.
Better understanding of the transparency processes at EU level.
Developing contact with similar actors as we are, showing as well a well defined interest in EU regulating procedures and not only.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Institutionalised European Partnerships under the future Horizon Europe Research and Innovation programme.
Horizon Europe budget and main focus
Diminishing the gap between Horizon 2020 and Horizon Europe, as a necessity in terms of continuity of the current research, and to keep the young researchers in Europe
Keeping the UK based academia and research implied in Horizon Europe
Give more weight to the SMEs in the area of R&D and I, by orienting more funds towards them in the partnerships with academia/research institutes.
